meta.title: The first Brazilian serverless platform

githubAppModal.title: Sorry! We need some permissions first!
githubAppModal.text: We ask you to install and authorize our app within your GitHub account so bohr.io can give to you all the power for creating and launching your projects its deploys and more. By clicking the button below, you'll see the screen aside, follow the instructions and happy deploying!

Every push to that Git repository will be deployed automatically.

rootDirectory.title: Root directory
rootDirectory.text: The directory within your project, in which the code is located. Leave this field empty if your code is noty located in a subdirectory.

productionDeploy.title: Production deploy
productionDeploy.text: By default, every commit pushed to the 'main' branch will trigger a Production Deployment instead of The usual Preview Deployment. You can Switch to a diffrent branch here.
